Package main

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • main.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    class Menu
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Manages the menu, all its components and all its functions.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • initMenuSelection

        private void initMenuSelection()
        Initializes the Swing components of the main menu.

      • initGameModeSelection

        private void initGameModeSelection()
        Initializes the Swing components of the game settings menu. Uses the getListOfFiles() method of the DataReader to get the list of map files.
        See Also:
        DataReader.getListOfFiles(String)

      • goToGameModeSelection

        private void goToGameModeSelection()
        Hides the main menu and shows the game settings menu.
        See Also:
        setVisibleGameModeSelection(boolean), setVisibleMainMenu(boolean)

      • goToMainMenu

        private void goToMainMenu()
        Hides the game settings menu and shows the main menu.
        See Also:
        setVisibleMainMenu(boolean), setVisibleGameModeSelection(boolean)

      • setVisibleMainMenu

        private void setVisibleMainMenu​(boolean b)
        Sets the visibility of the main menu to the value of the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        b - the parameter to which visibilities of all components of the main menu are to be set.

      • getCarPanelById

        private CarPanel getCarPanelById​(int id)
        Returns the CarPanel with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the CarPanel which is to be returned.
        Returns:
        the CarPanel with the id given as the parameter.

      • setLastGameTileSize

        void setLastGameTileSize​(int lastTileSize)
        Saves the tile-size (corresponds to the zoom-level) last used in the game before leaving back to the menu.
        Parameters:
        lastTileSize - the tile-size to be saved as the last tile-size used in the game.

      • getLastGameTileSize

        int getLastGameTileSize()
        Returns the tile-size last used in the previous game before leaving.
        Returns:
        the tile-size last used in the previous game before leaving.
